title: BRIEF-India's Asian Paints Sept Quarter Consol Profit Rises By Reuters
text:
BRIEF-India's Asian Paints Sept Quarter Consol Profit Rises

Stock Markets 9 minutes ago (Oct 22, 2019 19:25)

© Reuters. BRIEF-India's Asian Paints Sept Quarter Consol Profit Rises Oct 22 (Reuters) - Asian Paints Ltd : * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL NET PROFIT 8.23 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 4.92 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR * CONSENSUS FORECAST FOR SEPT QUARTER CONSOL PROFIT WAS 6.63 BILLION RUPEES * SEPT QUARTER CONSOL REVENUE FROM OPERATIONS 50.51 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 46.16 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR

BRIEF-India's Asian Paints Sept Quarter Consol Profit Rises
description: BRIEF-India's  Asian Paints Sept Quarter Consol Profit Rises
